TopicTitle: Can't click on the crew hatch

Articles.Content:
The title say it all.

When I mouse over the hatch, the game show that little text:"crew hatch".

I know that, so far, everything is ok; however, when I try to click to have the crew info, it doesn't do anything.

(I want to solve the problem because that little "button" will be helpful in 0.25)

Yes.

Is that the cause of the problem?

Yes.

Is that the cause of the problem?

Known issue on OSX. Not 100% certain, but I think they said it's a Unity bug. Workarounds here:

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92234-0-24-Mac-specific-issues-fixes
